name: Somebody Feed Pickle
description:
Somebody Feed Pickle

For more info and other games, please visit    www.hamcorgames.com 

2D Infinite Runner Platformer - Unity 2019.4 URP 2D-Lights - WebGL

Press SPACE to make Pickle jump and eat fruits to collect points, and collect hearts for more lives.

Be aware of the spikes  in front of  platforms, lava ditch and  giant spinners on the left.

If the game feels too easy, just tell me in the comments section, I will make it harder.  

Lightest game I've ever made,  just under 8MBs. Built in 5 days.

Please leave comments and share your thoughts and Have Fun feeding Pickle.
